name: com.nseutils.unityoauth
author: NSE Creative
description:
Simple OAuth2 client for Unity. /nBased on the authentication-unity repository from https://github.com/cdmvision/authentication-unity , this package was modified to have a better integration with more than one type of OAuth2 provider, including Azure Entra ID and multiple redirect system depending of witch platform you are runing it
 Web GL is a Work in progress yet, but is one of the main objectives from this package.
